item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I am Darius and I work as a software engineer in finance in London. I got my Computer Science degree at the University of Edinburgh in Scotland. I originally hail from Vilnius, Lithuania. The purpose of this blog is to share some personal coding related tinkerings.
